notice: This changelog is automatically AI-generated from the project’s history. It’s written for players (not developers), so it may occasionally miss nuance or be slightly wrong.

entries.title: Smarter filtering: exclusions + star levels
highlights: Exclude units/items/traits to remove games that match (e.g. “-Demacia 5”).
Filter by unit star level (2★ / 3★) when it matters for your question.
Voice input understands include vs exclude and can trigger common actions.

sections.title: Added
items: Exclude filters across the app (not just “include”): quickly answer “what if I avoid X?”. Tip: type “-” before a term, or Alt/Option-click a suggestion to exclude it.
Exclusions for equipped items too (exclude “Unit + Item” situations without throwing out the whole unit).
Unit star-level filters (and a selector) so you can compare 1★ vs 2★ vs 3★ contexts.

sections.title: Improved
items: Voice input: clearer feedback when it’s busy, plus safeguards against accidental rapid re-triggers.
Search: more forgiving matching (name normalization) so you can find things with fewer “exact spelling” misses.

sections.title: Fixed
items: Small interaction edge cases around exclusion flows and walkthrough steps.

entries.title: Deeper answers: item builds + comp explorer
highlights: Item Explorer: see best items (and full builds) for a unit in your exact filter context.
Cluster Explorer: discover high-performing “packages” of units/items/traits from your current spot.
Placement histograms and clearer summaries for “how good is this, and how often?”.

sections.title: Added
items: Item Explorer with one-click “apply build” and “equip item on unit” flows.
Build search that can show partial builds when a full 3-item set isn’t strongly supported.
Cluster Explorer with top-4 rate, average placement, and a placement distribution histogram.
Global item filters: limit suggestions to components, completed items, artifacts, emblems, or radiant items.
Item “set/prefix” filters to focus suggestions on a specific theme when items have multiple variants.

sections.title: Improved
items: Stats readouts and sorting options to make it easier to answer: “most impactful”, “most helpful”, or “most harmful”.
Walkthrough and UI polish around items (including an item-focused tour).
Multi-add: add several filters quickly without restarting your flow each time.

sections.title: Fixed
items: Search and mic UI overflow issues on smaller screens.
Startup hiccups around loading names/icons so the UI stays usable even if assets are slow.

entries.title: Launch: interactive placement graph
highlights: Search for units/items/traits, add them as filters, and watch the graph update around your context.
Tooltips show sample sizes and how much a node changes average placement from your current filters.
Touch/drag interactions and automatic framing to keep exploration smooth.

sections.title: Added
items: Interactive graph exploration with unit, item, and trait nodes.
Sorting controls (Impact / Helpful / Harmful) and a Top-K limit to control graph density.
Clear-all and quick filter editing to iterate on “what if?” questions faster.

sections.title: Improved
items: Better readability with hover interactions, stronger visual hierarchy, and placement-based color cues.
Search quality-of-life improvements as the list of things you can search grew.
